reviewText: La ví sin esperar mucho de ella pero la película es muy buena, la forma en la que se desarrolla la historia es diferente y lo mantiene a uno siempre a la expectativa.

reviewText: Wow.  Awesome story... keeps you on your toes and tuned in the whole time.Don't miss this thriller movie!
summary: Wow.  I never knew the beautiful Barbara Mori can do a thriller role.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Hollywood needs to re-learn what the Cinema in developing countries learned from them and are now out competing them.  This film was shot with a paltry $ 3 million dollar budget and is light years better than the garbage Hollywood is turning out today. Barbara Mori is one of the most stunning actresses of Latin America and was perfect for the part of Consuelo. All In All  The picture was well cast and the story told in manner to keep the audience guessing what would happen next. Boris Karloff would have loved it.
